basic.description: Elementary principles and applications of wave mechanics with special reference to molecular orbitals and chemical bonding.
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Quantum Mechanics

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    (CHEM211 or CHEM222) and (MATH110 or MATH111 or MATH112) and (MATH120 or MATH121 or MATH 122 or [MATH123 & MATH124]) and (PHYS104 or PHYS106 or PHYS107 or PHYS117).
Equivalency    CHEM346
